SystemPromptPlugin.description.defaultMessage: The System Prompt is an invisible message inserted at the start of the chat and can be used to give ChatGPT information about itself and general guidelines for how it should respond. The '{{ datetime }}' tag is automatically replaced by the current date and time (use this to give the AI access to the time).

PicoPlayerSettings.description.defaultMessage: The Sound System is an exposure of the pico code after export. If you want to enter your own music and sounds made in your own pico editor, you can export the .p8 file and scroll to the bottom of the file in a text editor. Collect the number block under __sfx__ and insert that here. Those numbers will be converted into the player on the next load of the PicoPlayer.

OpenAIOptions.pico8ManualLink.description: Label for the link that takes the user to the Pico-8 manual.

OpenAIOptions.apiKeyStorageNotice.defaultMessage: Your API key is stored only on this device and never transmitted to anyone except OpenAI.

OpenAIOptions.apiKeyInfo.defaultMessage: Be aware that OpenAI's APIs have associated cost. Click here to get more infos.
OpenAIOptions.apiKeyInfo.description: Information about OpenAI API costs with a link

Sidebar.chatHistory.description: Heading for the chat history screen

Sidebar.userSettings.description: Menu item that opens the user settings screen

authModals.signIn.description: Title for the Sign In modal

authModals.createAccount.description: Label for a button on the Sign In page that lets the user create an account instead

authModals.createAccountTitle.description: Title for the Create Account modal

authModals.signInExisting.defaultMessage: Or sign in to an existing account
authModals.signInExisting.description: Label for a button on the Create Account page that lets the user sign into their existing account instead

authModals.signInButton.description: Label for the sign in button in the login modal

authModals.signUpButton.description: Label for the sign up button in the signup modal

messageInput.error.recording.defaultMessage: Sorry, an error occurred trying to record audio.

recentChats.delete.confirmation.defaultMessage: The chat "{chatTitle}" will be permanently deleted. This cannot be undone.

recentChats.delete.error.defaultMessage: The chat "{chatTitle}" could not be deleted.

recentChats.noChats.description: Message shown on the Chat History screen for new users who haven't started their first chat session

role-chatgpt.description: Label that is shown above messages written by the AI (as opposed to the user)

role-system.description: Label that is shown above messages inserted into the conversation automatically by the system (as opposed to either the user or AI)

role-user.description: Label that is shown above messages written by the user (as opposed to the AI) in the user's own chat sessions (first person).

role-user-formal.description: Label that is shown above messages written by the user (as opposed to the AI) for publicly shared conversation (third person, formal).

settings.tab.speech.description: Label for the Speech tab in settings

settings.tab.ui.description: Label for the UI tab in settings

settings.tab.user.description: Label for the User tab in settings

parameters.model.label.description: Label for the model selection dropdown

parameters.top_p.label.description: Label for the top probability slider

openai.picoDat.label.description: Label for the Pico-8 Dat File selection

openai.apiKey.label.description: Label for the OpenAI API Key input

whisperOptions.useWhisper.label: Use the OpenAI Whisper API for speech recognition
whisperOptions.showMicrophone.label: Show microphone in message input

webSpeech.voiceLabel.description: Label for the voice selection dropdown in Web Speech plugin.

elevenLabs.voiceLabel.description: Label for the voice selection dropdown in ElevenLabs plugin.
